attributes.name: Anakor, Gaze of Serpents
attributes.description: “When it emerged from the pool, they looked upon what they had wrought. A monstrosity with the power of a god."
attributes.parsed_description: “When it emerged from the pool, they looked upon what they had wrought. A monstrosity with the power of a god."

attributes.name: Anarchy
attributes.description: "Come, the revolution has begun! Grab your spears and pitchforks and let us storm the keep!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Come, the revolution has begun! Grab your spears and pitchforks and let us storm the keep!"

attributes.name: Anatul's Rebirth
attributes.description: "Death is not the end for me."
attributes.parsed_description: "Death is not the end for me."

attributes.name: Ancestral Bow
attributes.description: A bow from a people long gone, oddly preserved by the magic of this island.
attributes.parsed_description: A bow from a people long gone, oddly preserved by the magic of this island.

attributes.name: Ancestral Fire Staff
attributes.description: "Which did ancient people tame first, magic or fire? Boats might have come before control over fire, and a boat could get you here to find out magic exists."
attributes.parsed_description: "Which did ancient people tame first, magic or fire? Boats might have come before control over fire, and a boat could get you here to find out magic exists."

attributes.name: Ancestral Great Axe
attributes.description: "The age of a weapon matters not, only the sharpness of the edge and the skill of the wielder"
attributes.parsed_description: "The age of a weapon matters not, only the sharpness of the edge and the skill of the wielder"

attributes.name: Ancestral Ice Gauntlets
attributes.description: An Ice Gauntlet of the ancestors, long forgotten to history... until now.
attributes.parsed_description: An Ice Gauntlet of the ancestors, long forgotten to history... until now.

attributes.name: Ancestral Kite Shield
attributes.description: "Did ancient people have kites? I suppose they could still have kite shields and call them something else."
attributes.parsed_description: "Did ancient people have kites? I suppose they could still have kite shields and call them something else."

attributes.name: Ancestral Life Staff
attributes.description: "Seeking to preserve life is one of our most ancient traditions."
attributes.parsed_description: "Seeking to preserve life is one of our most ancient traditions."

attributes.name: Ancestral Longsword
attributes.description: How old is this place, to have weapons such as this?
attributes.parsed_description: How old is this place, to have weapons such as this?

attributes.name: Ancestral Musket
attributes.description: "Another musket from a culture that predates their invention. The undead of this place must somehow assimilate new technologies."
attributes.parsed_description: "Another musket from a culture that predates their invention. The undead of this place must somehow assimilate new technologies."

attributes.name: Ancestral Rapier
attributes.description: "Stabbing is an ancient art. Stabbity-stab-stab! People have been doing it just like that for many generations."
attributes.parsed_description: "Stabbing is an ancient art. Stabbity-stab-stab! People have been doing it just like that for many generations."

attributes.name: Ancestral Round Shield
attributes.description: This basic shield can deflect thosands of blows.
attributes.parsed_description: This basic shield can deflect thosands of blows.

attributes.name: Ancestral Spear
attributes.description: "No doubt our ancestors used spears, but this... surely this is not really what theirs were like."
attributes.parsed_description: "No doubt our ancestors used spears, but this... surely this is not really what theirs were like."

attributes.name: Ancestral Tower Shield
attributes.description: A tall shield from an ancient people.
attributes.parsed_description: A tall shield from an ancient people.

attributes.name: Anchor Mate
attributes.description: "Let down the anchor and light the cannons! FIRE!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Let down the anchor and light the cannons! FIRE!"

attributes.name: Anchor's Mark
attributes.description: "X marks the spot."
attributes.parsed_description: "X marks the spot."

attributes.name: Ancient Avenger
attributes.description: "Let not my sacrifice be in vain. You are our last hope."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let not my sacrifice be in vain. You are our last hope."

attributes.description: A weapon that seems to have been wielded by the Ancients at some point in its history.
